survey_name: Adoption of AI in Small Business Inventory Management Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the current adoption levels, challenges, and future intentions of small businesses regarding AI tools for inventory management.

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your business's current use of AI in inventory management?
answer_options: We do not use any AI tools for inventory management
We use basic AI tools (e.g., demand forecasting)
We use advanced AI tools (e.g., real-time tracking, automated ordering)
We are currently evaluating AI solutions for inventory management
